thread.title: Gary Smith
thread.title_full: Dracakis Jewellers reviewed by Gary Smith

author: Gary Smith
title: Gary Smith
text: We had a great experience with Peter at warringah mall. A very pleasant and polite man. As we were not sure what we wanted at first, Peter spent some time with us showing us different options and designs. We picked out 2 rings thanks to Peter and his expertise. For me first impression is everything and Peter does his job brilliantly, thanks
